data.name: The Nearest Prime Number from Input
data.description:
In this kata the objective is to find the nearest prime number to the greatest number in an array.

Ex. ```[2, 4, 5, 6, 80]``` --> ```79```

If the input is a string ```return 2```.

Ex. ```"667"``` --> ```2```

If the input is string list(an array with only strings)```return 2```.

Ex. ```["454", "34546", "rh566"]``` --> ```2```

If it's a list with strings, and integers(or floats) find the highest numeric value and ```return``` the nearest prime number to it, and just incase, decimal values do not count as prime numbers, so make sure your solution doesn't pop out any floats or it won't pass the tests.

Ex. ```[2, 3.0, 5.6, "6"]``` --> ```7```

Good Luck!

Happy Coding! :)
